name: BlockBook
description: Get data from the Blockbook indexer

endpoints.shortDescription: Get balance for a single address.
endpoints.detailedDescription: Returns an object with balance and details about an address.

endpoints.shortDescription: Get balance for an array of addresses.
endpoints.detailedDescription: Return balances and details for an array of addresses. Limited to 20 addresses per request.

endpoints.shortDescription: Get UTXOs for a single address.
endpoints.detailedDescription: Returns an object with UTXOs associated with an address.

endpoints.shortDescription: Get UTXOs for an array of addresses
endpoints.detailedDescription: return utxos associate with an array of addresses. Limited to 20 addresses per request

endpoints.shortDescription: Get details for a single transaction.
endpoints.detailedDescription: Returns an object with details for a single transaction.

endpoints.shortDescription: Get details for an array of transactions.
endpoints.detailedDescription: Return details for an array of transactions. Limited to 20 transactions per request.
